review: Received best in class treatment. ****** **** * ***** ********* *** explained everything regarding treatment. Visited for root canal treatment and caps implantation for my mother and it was handled very well. Fully satisfied with the treatment and support. Best place for Children, adults, parents and everyone infact.

As always, it was a pleasure to walk in to  Clinic. 

Extremely clean office,  Professional, Courteous, and Friendly staff.

My special mention and sincere thanks to 
Dr. Himaspoorthi . It’s rare to find a doctor that combines personal touch and care for a patient and as a person with outstanding quality of medical care.

I have been to the clinic for my wisdom tooth extraction and Dr. Hima Spoorthi explained me about the procedure in detail and has done an excellent job in treating me carefully. I could sense no pain even after the procedure was done. The whole process was so smooth and simple. I would strongly recommend this clinic as the doctor is well experienced and provides the perfect treatment for your problem.

I would definetely recommend the doctor!
It has been a very good session and I have had a good experience. The doctor is well versed and very friendly.
Highly recommended.

I've had the smoothest experience with Dr Hima Spoorthy. she takes care of your sensitivities while working on your teeth. She is an excellent dentist. she took her time in explaining the procedure she was doing. she educated me on  diagnosis, treatment and preventative care in detail.

I have had the good fortune of having Dr. Hima Spoorthy  as my dentist . She has taken care of my entire family. She has done root canals ,fixed broken teeth . we trust her work and advice completely, and all of her work has been outstanding." WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!".
reply_text: Thank you so much for the trust you have in us.

review: I have got my teeth cleaned with Dr. Spoorthy   . She was so gentle throughout the whole procedure.
The doctor is good and very friendly for me it has been a nice experience will definitely recommend to other friends and my relatives …

The treatment experience was a good one and the doctor was decorous I would prefer visiting again 
Thank you !!
It was really a very good experience. I was treated in a very efficient and a professional manner.  *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **********
